QuestData.Title: The Deadliest of Poisons
QuestData.Description:
You've got the poison. Now you gotta to take out that ogre. Goon's name is Gutgruk the Tough.
He usually patrols around the citadel. I betcha it's lookin' for your expedition right now!
Poison your blades, then take that monster down. Show him he ain't so tough!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Gutgruk is incredibly tough. Use Instant Poison to weaken him!
